headline: Bank of New York Mellon (NYSE:BK) Unveils Enhanced Products for Wealth Managers at INSITE 2025
summary: During the INSITE 2025 conference, the Bank of New York Mellon (NYSE:BK) announced several product enhancements aimed at wealth managers, highlighting its commitment to innovation. These product-related announcements, such as those designed for the Wove platform, likely reinforced positive sentiments about the company. Over the last month, the company's stock rose by 8%, a move that aligns with the overall upward trend of a 2% market climb last week and a 12% increase over the past year...

headline: 5 Top S&P 500 Financial Stocks That Bucked the "Sell in May" Trend
summary: COIN, NTRS, BK, BEN and BAC defied May's selloff mantra, riding strong fundamentals and sector tailwinds to gains.

headline: BNY Unveils Enhancements for Wealth Managers at INSITE® 2025
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, will announce several enhancements to its products for wealth managers during its annual INSITE conference this week.

headline: U.S. Banks' Brokered Deposits Decline For 5th Consecutive Quarter In Q1
summary: Brokered deposits at US banks declined for the fifth quarter in a row as many banks reduce reliance on expensive sources of funding amid the growth of low-cost deposits.

raw.headline: U.S. Banks' Brokered Deposits Decline For 5th Consecutive Quarter In Q1
raw.summary: Brokered deposits at US banks declined for the fifth quarter in a row as many banks reduce reliance on expensive sources of funding amid the growth of low-cost deposits.
